name: Dont Touch This (petredy)
description:
Dont Touch This is a VR Game developed for the Develop to Help Ukraine Game Jam

You control a rubber band that connects your hands, which you have to move trough some rails without touching anything.

This game only uses the tracking of your VR device as input no buttons are needed. 

This game should be playable on every VR Device supported on the Oculus Rift Platform(Rift, Rift S, Quest/Quest2 with Link) and SteamVR Platform(HTC Vives, Valve Index, Windows Mixed Reality Headsets). I only tested it with a Quest 2 and Link. I am sadly not able to confirm if it works on other devices.
